meta.title: Community Celebrations Live
meta.description: Trainers, get ready to GO during Community Celebration: Doncaster 2025!

banner.alt: Community celebrations banner with pastel confetti

welcome.title: Community Celebrations
welcome.subtitle: Drop into the Corn Exchange, plan your day, and discover the key moments we have lined up.

cards.title: Event hub opens
cards.body: Head over to the Corn Exchange for Merch!

cards.title: Trading Post @ Corn Exchange
cards.body: Trade your Pokemon at the market square!

cards.title: Closing ceremony
cards.body: Head to the corn exchange to find out who wins the CDL.

cards.title: After-hours social
cards.body: RSVP to keep the celebrations going with food, music, and late-night vibes.

route_tours.heading: Route tours
route_tours.description: Join guided walks that uncover Doncaster lore, raid hotspots, and hidden challenges. Routes get going by Community Ambassadors outside of the Corn Exchange

story.title: Story brief
story.body: A mysterious energy is rippling through Doncaster. The Fairy Council needs allies, but Team NO Wild have their own plans.
story.alt: Illustration of Team NO Wild characters

mission.title: Your mission
mission.body: Choose your path, complete featured activities, and collect stamps to unlock celebratory rewards.

activities.prizes_intro: You can earn up to two prizes today.

rewards.title: Earn 4 stamps
rewards.description: Play through the headline activities for passport stamps and receive merch.
rewards.info: Stamp cards available from the welcome desk.

prizes_showcase.heading: Prizes include‚Ä¶
prizes_showcase.caption: Collect prizes at the Community Desk beside the Corn Exchange entrance.

map.heading: Map
notes: Rest zones: Waterdale, Town Fields & Elmfield Park

locations.label: Herten Triangle & Lakeside
locations.alt: Map showing Herten Triangle and Lakeside

more.heading: More to explore
more.body: Use this space for FAQ links, volunteer sign-ups, accessibility info, or anything else you need on the day.
